content:
I've got this to a point where the Google login is working for me on a development site (my current need) but would love others to test as needed. This bundles the HybridAuth library so no additional third party services are needed, besides the API keys from the service you want to allow people to sign in with. (e.g. at one point I think we talked about allowing sign ins to Forum, B.org, etc. with GitHub â€“ which should be possible with this)

https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/hybridauth

backdrop-contrib/hybridauth
Contribute to backdrop-contrib/hybridauth development by creating an account on GitHub.
Thanks for working on that @Laryn ++
